sentences.sentence: Evolutionist Charles Darwin first marvelled at flesh — eating plants in the mid-19th century.
sentences.translation: 19世纪中叶，进化论者查尔斯·达尔文首次对食肉植物感到惊奇。

sentences.sentence: I was an atheist and evolutionist most of my life.
sentences.translation: 我大半辈子都是个无神论进化论者。

sentences.sentence: In refusing to be obsolete, you challenged and defied the evolutionist historians.
sentences.translation: 你拒绝被淘汰，就是对进化论史学家的挑战和蔑视。
